item.title: 英特尔表示不会剥离大部分股权后 Mobileye 大涨
item.description: 在英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）表示 "目前 "不准备出售其在自动驾驶技术制造商 Mobileye Global Inc.【原文：Mobileye Global Inc. shares surged the most in nearly two years after Intel Corp. said it isn’t “currently” preparing to unload its majority stake in the maker of autonomous driving technology, easing investors’ fears.】

item.title: 宣布结束与好市多的合作关系后，Sunrun 业绩下滑
item.description: 住宅太阳能供应商Sunrun Inc.周三晚些时候表示，由于未能达成双方都同意的条款，该公司将终止与好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale Corp）的销售合作关系，之后该公司股价下跌达3.4%。【原文：Sunrun Inc. shares fell as much as 3.4% after the residential solar provider said late Wednesday it was ending its sales partnership with Costco Wholesale Corp. after the companies failed to reach mutually agreeable terms.】

item.title: 印度 IIFL 称监管机构取消黄金贷款业务禁令
item.description: 印度储备银行在周四提交给交易所的一份文件中表示，印度储备银行取消了对 IIFL Finance Ltd. 黄金贷款业务的限制，立即生效。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India lifted its restrictions on IIFL Finance Ltd.’s gold loan business, effective immediately, the Indian shadow lender said in a filing with exchanges Thursday.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚称北约必须击落俄罗斯的流浪无人机
item.description: 拉脱维亚总统表示，北约需要具备击落误入成员国领土的俄罗斯无人机的能力，同时他呼吁加强北约东翼的防空能力。【原文：Latvia’s president said NATO needs to have the ability to shoot down Russian drones that stray into member states’ territory as he called for increased air defenses on the alliance’s eastern flank.】

item.title: 欧盟在 Illumina 上的失败引发荷兰呼吁赋予其更多交易权力
item.description: 荷兰竞争监督机构正在寻求加强权力，以调查更多的小型交易，这些交易可能会破坏新兴科技市场的竞争，因为欧盟试图对这些交易进行审查的努力遭到了欧盟最高法院的否决。【原文：The Dutch competition watchdog is seeking beefed-up powers to probe more small deals that risk crushing competition in fledgling tech markets after the European Union’s attempts to vet them was shot down by the bloc’s top court.】

item.title: 新输油管线导致美国重要枢纽储油罐干涸
item.description: 由于加拿大新建的一条大型输油管道将油流转移到其他地方，美国一个重要原油枢纽的储油罐已经枯竭到接近底部，交易商长期依赖的市场信号也因此变得模糊不清。【原文：Oil-storage tanks at a key US crude hub have drained to near their bottoms as a massive new pipeline in Canada diverts flows elsewhere, muddying market signals that traders have long relied on.】

item.title: 德意志银行保留过早赎回土耳其债券的希望
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）的策略师们是去年年底宣布土耳其里拉债券将成为 2024 年最佳投资之一的最主要声音之一，尽管他们在进入今年时持谨慎和低配的态度。【原文：Deutsche Bank strategists were among the most prominent voices declaring late last year that Turkish lira bonds would be one of the best investments of 2024, even as they entered the year cautious and underweight.】

item.title: 印度禁止安信银行部门管理新债发行
item.description: 印度资本市场监管部门已禁止 Axis Capital Ltd. 担任印度公司新债发行的管理人，这是印度证券市场的最新一次打压行动。【原文：India’s capital market regulator has barred Axis Capital Ltd. from acting as a manager for new offerings of debt by Indian companies, the latest crackdown in the country’s securities market.】

item.title: Pimco 首席信息官伊瓦辛谈美联储的重大决策
item.description:

item.title: 耶伦称美联储减息是 "积极信号"，政策仍具限制性
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美联储周三的降息是 "美国经济现状的一个非常积极的信号"，反映了在降低通胀方面取得的进展以及保护就业市场的决心。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut Wednesday was “a very positive sign for where the US economy is,” reflecting progress in bringing down inflation and a determination to protect the job market.】

item.title: 道指缺乏人工智能股票，蓝筹指数 "落后于曲线
item.description: 人工智能的崛起重新调整了美国股市的秩序，将英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.不过，在一个充满传奇色彩的角落，人工智能带来的变化还没有显现出来，那就是道琼斯工业平均指数。【原文：The rise of artificial intelligence has reordered the American stock market, pushing the likes of Nvidia Corp. and other chipmakers into the upper echelons. There’s one storied corner, though, where the changes wrought by AI haven’t shown up: the Dow Jones Industrial Average.】

item.title: 资金紧张加剧，Northvolt 债权人向 PJT 寻求建议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着陷入困境的电动汽车电池制造商的资金紧张问题日益加深，Northvolt AB 的贷款人已选择投资银行 PJT Partners 帮助提供选择建议。【原文：Lenders to Northvolt AB have selected investment bank PJT Partners to help advise on options as a cash crunch deepens at the troubled maker of electric-car batteries, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Datamaran 获得摩根士丹利基金 3300 万美元投资
item.description: Datamaran Ltd.是一家专门从事环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）的软件公司，该公司表示已从摩根士丹利管理的投资基金获得了 3300 万美元的 C 轮融资。【原文：Datamaran Ltd., a software company that specializes in ESG, said it received $33 million in Series C financing from investment funds managed by Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 巴伐利亚用于青少年的 Mpox 疫苗获欧盟批准
item.description: 巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）是唯一一家获准生产麻腮风疫苗的公司，其青少年疫苗已获得欧洲监管机构的批准。【原文：Bavarian Nordic A/S, one of the only companies with a vaccine approved for mpox, has received regulatory approval in Europe for the use of its jab for adolescents.】

item.title: 普利兹克表示，芝加哥应酝酿解决预算危机的所有方案
item.description: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克（JB Pritzker）周三表示，由于芝加哥明年将面临近 10 亿美元的赤字，该市需要提出一切可能的解决方案，以找出解决预算危机的办法。【原文：As Chicago faces a nearly $1 billion deficit next year, the city needs to bring every possible solution forward to figure out how to address the budget crisis, Illinois Governor JB Pritzker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃及总理称明年埃及天然气产量将恢复正常水平
item.description: 埃及总理表示，埃及的天然气产量将在 2025 年 6 月前恢复到正常水平，而最近的产量下滑和需求上升使埃及多年来首次成为天然气进口国。【原文：Egypt’s natural gas production will return to normal levels by June 2025, the prime minister said, just as a recent output slump and rising demand turned the country into an importer of the fuel for the first time in years.】

item.title: 乌克兰继续就阿塞拜疆天然气过境问题进行谈判，但尚未达成协议
item.description: 乌克兰正在就通过其天然气管道网络向欧洲供应阿塞拜疆天然气进行谈判，但尚未达成协议。【原文：Ukraine is in talks about supplying Azeri gas to Europe through its network of gas pipelines but hasn’t yet reached an agreement.】

item.title: 围绕纽约市市长埃里克-亚当斯的所有调查指南
item.description: 即使是长期关注市政府的纽约人也可能需要一张记分卡来追踪围绕纽约市长埃里克-亚当斯及其核心圈子的所有联邦腐败调查。【原文：Even longtime New Yorkers who follow city government might need a scorecard to keep track of all of the federal corruption investigations surrounding New York Mayor Eric Adams and his inner circle.】

item.title: 美国现房销售下滑至 10 月以来最低水平
item.description: 美国现房销售量在 8 月份降至 10 个月以来的最低点，原因是在近期抵押贷款利率下降之前，人们的负担能力仍面临挑战。【原文：Sales of existing US homes fell in August to a 10-month low on persistent affordability challenges ahead of a recent decline in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 象牙海岸酝酿下一年度可可价格至少上涨 23
item.description: 世界头号可可生产国象牙海岸正在考虑提高即将收获的可可的出场价，使其高于竞争对手加纳，尽管两国种植者的价格仍将远远低于全球市场。【原文：Ivory Coast, the world’s top cocoa producer, is considering raising farmgate prices for the coming harvest above rival Ghana, although growers in both countries would still be fetching well less than the global market.】

item.title: 各大银行对美联储降息速度意见不一
item.description: 华尔街最大的银行在美联储明年降息的速度和幅度上存在分歧，这为金融市场在前景明朗之前的动荡不安埋下了伏笔。【原文：Wall Street’s biggest banks are divided over how fast and deep the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates over the next year, setting the stage for jittery financial markets until the outlook clears.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师称，裕信银行应尽快对德国商业银行采取行动
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：UniCredit SpA should act quickly if it wants to be successful in a potential acquisition of Commerzbank AG, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 南非四年来首次降低利率
item.description: 南非央行降息 25 个基点，将利率从 15 年来的高点下调，这也是四年多来的首次宽松。【原文：South Africa’s central bank cut interest rates by 25 basis points, lowering them from a 15-year high and marking the first easing in more than four years.】

item.title: 美国向抗击厄尔尼诺的非洲农民提供 8000 万美元援助
item.description: 美国在一项新计划中承诺提供 8000 多万美元的资金，帮助三个南部非洲国家提高农业产量，美国认为这三个国家有潜力向更广泛的地区供应粮食。【原文：The US has committed more than $80 million in funding under a new program to help grow agricultural output in three southern African nations it sees as having the potential to supply food to the broader region.】

item.title: 亚马逊推出人工智能助理，帮助网商繁荣发展
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在推出一款人工智能助手，旨在帮助在线商家管理业务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is launching an artificially intelligent assistant designed to help online merchants manage their businesses.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所将进军碳减排信用额市场
item.description: 瑞士证券交易所运营商 SIX 集团正在扩大碳清除市场，试图实现产品多样化。【原文：Swiss stock exchange operator SIX Group AG is expanding in the carbon removal market as it attempts to diversify its offerings.】

item.title: 巴西部分地区预报将降雨，阿拉比卡咖啡暂停涨势
item.description: 由于天气预报显示巴西部分地区将出现降雨，阿拉比卡咖啡价格有所回落。【原文：Arabica coffee eased as forecasts signaled rain in parts of top producer Brazil, which has faced persistently hot and dry weather.】

item.title: 马斯拉尼在美国调查中退休，道明银行任命秦致为首席执行官
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）表示，该行首席执行官巴拉特-马斯拉尼（Bharat Masrani）将于 4 月份退休，雷蒙德-秦（Raymond Chun）将接任最高职位。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank said Chief Executive Officer Bharat Masrani will retire in April and Raymond Chun will take the top job, as the bank grapples with investigations by the Department of Justice and financial regulators into lapses of money-laundering controls at its US branches.】

item.title: 联合国专家敦促各国避免利用人工智能发动战争
item.description: 一个联合国专家组呼吁各国严格限制人工智能的军事用途，以防止侵犯人权和出现新的军备竞赛。【原文：A United Nations expert group called on countries to strictly limit military use of artificial intelligence to prevent human rights violations and the emergence of a new arms race.】

item.title: 消除美国道路交通事故死亡人数的登月计划
item.description:
美国交通部正在推动无线 "车对车 "技术，以减少交通事故死亡人数。但所谓的 V2X 应用之路并不清晰。【原文：

The US Department of Transportation is pushing wireless “vehicle-to-everything” technology to cut traffic fatalities. But the path to so-called V2X adoption isn’t clear.

】
